citations.narrative:
Four of the whelping enclosures have not been getting a regular daily spot clean and had soiled material in the middle of
them. A daily spot clean of hard surfaces dogs can touch helps provide for their comfort and wellbeing by keeping their
living areas free from soiled material. A daily spot clean is required for all hard surfaces that dogs can contact and often
enough in soft bedding to prevent dogs from contacting waste. Ensure to maintain a routine of daily spot cleaning for the
whelping enclosures and for all hard surfaces that dogs contact.
***To be corrected from October 4, 2024 forward.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.1(c)(3) 
   
Housing facilities, general. 
Four of the whelping enclosures have not been getting a regular daily spot clean and had soiled material in the middle of 
them. A daily spot clean of hard surfaces dogs can touch helps provide for their comfort and wellbeing by keeping their 
living areas free from soiled material. A daily spot clean is required for all hard surfaces that dogs can contact and often 
enough in soft bedding to prevent dogs from contacting waste. Ensure to maintain a routine of daily spot cleaning for the 
whelping enclosures and for all hard surfaces that dogs contact. 
***To be corrected from October 4, 2024 forward. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
